title: Islanders
overview: Li Xianhong, a charismatic entrepreneur, is entangled in a web of complicated relationships with his business partner, Xiaowen, his assistant, Hanrong, and a young woman, Lilian. Lilian reconnects with her senior Jay, and jealousy brews. When Xianhong's offhand remarks spark a public backlash, social media erupts, and Xianhong faces the decision that could cost him everything he holds dear.
